name: Beat-Box Baby: Trainer and Voice Drum Machine HOT
name_original: Beat-Box Baby: Trainer and Voice Drum Machine HOT
description:
*** FREE for a very limited amount of time. Only the next certain amount of downloads will be given at no cost :) ***

See what previous users have already said about this app:
* * * * * "I can't stop beatboxing, me and my friends love how easy it is!" - ___dupp
* * * * * "No lie, I am now beat-boxing for my school's a capella group because of this app" - ___hgrl2
* * * * * "This app lettin' me drop some sick beats!" - ___oblue
* * * * * "I'm so good at this I can show it to dr dre" - ___n$21
...and ton's more

Let's face it...Beat-boxing (making dope beats with your mouth) is a God-given talent right?...WRONG!

This simple but very effective app will teach ANYONE (yes even you) to impress their friends with beat-boxing skills

And yes, you can easily be one of them. It's simple...but EFFECTIVE. Learn how to pronounce different percussion instruments, learn how to time your beats, shake your iPhone to make your DJ scratch over your beats, and use the app as a drum machine to kick off any session.

10+ Sample loops are already included to get you started (free version includes 4). All sounds recorded and beat sequences were created by a beatboxing professional.

So what are you waiting for? All you need to do is take a few seconds to download this small app, and you'll be well on your way to beatboxing better than 95% of the population...all at a cost of...nothing. Enjoy.
